comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Following up on what I said nearly a year ago. Ohtani just because the first player to ever join the 50/50 club in base history. The 50/50 club meaning he hit 50 home runs and stole 50 bases. Making it even more impressive, he is a pitcher that accomplished this feat while recovering from Tommy John surgery. Nobody on this forum is talking about it…

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on September 19, 2024, 11:40:57 PMFollowing up on what I said nearly a year ago. Ohtani just because the first player to ever join the 50/50 club in base history. The 50/50 club meaning he hit 50 home runs and stole 50 bases. Making it even more impressive, he is a pitcher that accomplished this feat while recovering from Tommy John surgery. Nobody on this forum is talking about it…I was hoping I could find a topic on this.  Isn't this shit crazy. Ohtani just had the single greatest baseball game ever (arguably) going 6-6, 10 RBI, 3 HR's and 2 SBs in route to becoming the first 50/50 player.  Did you see the attendance at LoanDepot (lol, I had to google what the name of the stadium was)..it seemed to be at best, 40-50% capacity, maybe? ESPN headline "WNBA-record crowd sees Clark, Fever drop season finale to Mystics" , Jets played the Pats, are relatively boring game..in NFL discord chats I didn't see any MLB talk.I remember how captivating the 90's HR Race was each night with Griff/Bonds/Sosa, then Sosa/Bonds.  Cal Ripken breaking the all time consecutive games played streak, etc etc. Seems like most could give a shit.  I grew up on baseball so I'll always care to an extent, but I didn't watch live.  Pretty sad.  Fred needs to go already.  This is just proof MLB needs an overhaul.  Move to a 100 game season and 100% electronic strike-zone for starters.  I use to be a purist but anymore, I just want the game to evolve.  I should have been placing bets on things like what game he'd break it, what inning he'd do it in, and all the countless fun props that were likely out there.  I wish I cared more. Anyways, some incredible stuff.  Too bad he had to take a year off pitching..though not sure this would have happened
